member.name: T:Player
member.summary: Represents a player entity with health properties.

member.name: P:Player.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the player.

member.name: P:Player.MaxHp
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum health points of the player.

member.name: P:Player.Hp
member.summary: Gets the current health points of the player.

member.name: M:Player.#ctor(System.String,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified name and maximum health points.
member.param: The maximum health points of the player.

member.name: M:Player.PrintHealth
member.summary: Prints the health status of the player.
